translation:
Mr. Anacleto José de Matos, army paymaster, of the money in the fund, will deliver to citizen José de Sousa Neto or to his order Rs. 3:986$120, three contos nine hundred eighty-six thousand one hundred twenty, an amount of three hundred and seventy horses, which by order of the Most Excellent Sir

Field to the left of Jaguarão, January 13, 1837. Antônio de Sousa Neto Interim Commander of the Army Domingos José de Almeida, Colonel General Quartermaster.
